actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to authorize the coinage of fifty-cent pieces bearing a design emblematic of the 1980 Winter Olympic Games.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury, in recognition of the 1980 winter Olympic games, to be held at Lake Placid, New York, to coin and issue 50-cent pieces of standard size, weight, and composition, except that each piece shall be a clad coin as defined in the Coinage Act of 1965. Directs the Secretary to distribute such pieces at a price, not to exceed ten dollars per piece, determined by the Secretary.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the coinage of fifty-cent pieces bearing a design emblematic of the 1980 Winter Olympic Games.
